name: Mikul the Netherbound
description:
Mikul the Netherbound is a 2D adventure game set in the depths of an ancient forest where exploration, combat and narrative carry a heavy weight in the development of the story.
Our hero Mikul will have to face many challenges as he delves deeper into the mysterious forest, facing dark creatures and being confronted with intricate puzzles. He'll make use of the resources and the magic that the forest will place at his disposal, in order to reach one of the several endings available in our story.

  • Dynamic Combat Take advantage of different combinations of attack or wield the magic of the forest.
  • Exploration Find secrets, hidden passages and corridors that ease your dangerous trip throught the forest.
  • Open World You choose what paths to take to delve into the depths of the ancient forest.
  • Crafting Make the best from the resources you find in order to survive the dangers.
  • Stealth Sometimes, the biggest victory comes from avoiding your enemies.
  • Several Endings Your decisions will shape the fate that awaits Mikul.
  • Play with keyboard and mouse or controler, you decide!
